Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the inclusion of a food service establishment's products on a third-party food delivery platform without a written agreement authorizing such inclusion, and to provide penalties
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the inclusion of a food service establishment's products on a third-party food delivery platform without a written agreement authorizing such inclusion, and to provide penalties.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring third-party food delivery services to provide a description of the telephone numbers listed in connection with food service establishments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring third-party food delivery services to provide a description of the telephone numbers listed in connection with food service establishments.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the prohibition of certain telephone order charges by third-party food delivery services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending the prohibition of certain telephone order charges by third-party food delivery services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the limitation on fees charged to food service establishments by third-party food delivery services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending the limitation on fees charged to food service establishments by third-party food delivery services.
